original_text: but whoever causes one of these little ones who believe in me to sin, it would be better for him to have a great millstone fastened around his neck and to be drowned in the depth of the sea.
korean_text: 누구든지 나를 믿는 이 작은 자 중 하나를 실족하게 하면 차라리 연자 맷돌이 그 목에 달려서 깊은 바다에 빠뜨려지는 것이 나으니라

sentences.original_text: but whoever causes one of these little ones

sentences.original_text: who believe in me to sin
sentences.korean_translation: 나를 믿는 자를 죄 짓게 하는 자는

to have a great millstone fastened around his neck
